original: 劉備麾下將領。漢中之戰時，劉備遣張飛、馬超、吳蘭等屯下辯，被曹洪與張既大敗，吳蘭戰敗後被陰平氐強端所殺，傳其首回長安。
text: Liu Bei's generals. During the Battle of Hanzhong, Liu Bei sent Zhang Fei, Ma Chao, Wu Lan and others to go to the next station to argue, but was defeated by Cao Hong and Zhang Ji. After Wu Lan was defeated, he was killed by Yin Pingdi Qiang Duan, and he returned to Chang'an for the first time.
